Look up details on module(s)

module_details.Rd

Return a tbl_df of information for outsider module(s). If repo is NULL, will return details on all available modules.

module_details(repo = NULL)

Arguments

repo

Vector of one or more outsider module repositories, default NULL.

Value

tbl_df

See also

Other user: log_set, module_exists, module_help, module_import, module_installed, module_install, module_search, module_uninstall

Examples

library(outsider)
# return table of ALL available modules on GitHub
# NOT RUN - takes too long
# (available_modules <- module_search())

# look-up whether specific module exists
# NOT RUN
# repo <- 'dombennett/om..goodbye.world'
# (suppressWarnings(module_exists(repo = repo)))
repo <- 'dombennett/om..hello.world'
(module_exists(repo = repo))
#> dombennett/om..hello.world 
#>                       TRUE 
# get details on specific module(s)
(module_details(repo = repo))
#> # A tibble: 1 x 7
#>   repo    program  details   versions updated_at          watcher_count url     
#>   <chr>   <chr>    <chr>     <chr>    <dttm>                      <int> <chr>   
#> 1 domben… hello w… Template… latest   2019-01-09 16:43:39             0 https:/…
